Posts.Content: I will never view those commercials that say if it lasts 4hrs the same again. i have robotic surgery on Nov 12th. Took Cialis and Lavitra for a couple of months. Started Trimix injections a couple of weeks ago. First injection on a Friday in dr's office was 0.1cc. The next Friday I used 0.2cc. Not enough results. The Wednesday after that I used 0.25cc. Not enough results. Last night (5 days since last injection) I use 0.3cc. Pain within 10 min and hard as a rock. You could have hung a coat on it it et didn't hurt so bad. After 3 hrs and taking Sudafed and trying ice packs and cold shower I told the wife we need to go in to ER. Injected at 8:30, arrive at ER at 12:00. Around 1:45 was injected with something I can't remember what. By 2:30 no results and my Urologist was called in. I fell asleep finally and 5 min before he came in the door I woke up and things had deflated.
Posts.Signature: June PSA 7.3 July PSA 7.4 Biopsy mid September, 3 out of 12 cancer. 2 were 30%, 1 was 60%. Gleason 3+4=7 DaVinci Robotic surgery Nov 12th. Nov 20th followup, no cancer outside prostate, cathiter removed.
Posts.Title: ED+Trimix=ER visit

Posts.Title: Surgery Date Friday 1/11/2013

Posts.Content: Have to make the call weather I am up to it at "game" time.Thanks for the info scottKS. I have an engagement party for my son and his fiance the Friday after my Monday surgery. I'll
Posts.Title: Surgery will be on Nov 12th

Posts.Content: 57 year old (58 in January). PSA in May was 7.3. One month later it was 7.4. Biopsey on Sept 9th. Gleason score 3+4 (7). 3 of 12 had cancer, 2 were 30%, 1 was 60%. Enlarged prostate smooth with no bumps or hard spots detected. Opted for robotic surgery just to yank that sucker out of there and get rid of the cancer. Dr (who has done hundreds of surgeries) said a very good chance it has not expanded out of the membrane. I talked to a friend who had this 2 years ago with said Dr and was very pleased with him and the outcome (he had a Gleason of 9 and PSA of 12). My goal is to ride my Polaris RZR on New years Day.
Posts.Title: Surgery will be on Nov 12th

Posts.Content: Well, the 12th has arrived. 8:00 AM Mountain time it the schedule for the suregery, 2 1/2 hrs from now. See you all on the other side (Other side of 12:00 that is).

Posts.Signature: June PSA 7.3 July PSA 7.4 Biopsy mid September, 3 out of 12 cancer. 2 were 30%, 1 was 60%. Gleason 3+4=7 DaVinci Robotic surgery Nov 12th. Nov 20th followup, no cancer outside prostate, cathiter removed.
Posts.Title: 5 months after surgery

Posts.Content: I think there is something in the air at WalMart. Up to a month after my surgery, everytime I went in there I would leak. I did not have much of a problem other places. My recovery was on the same time line as yours. I hated the Depends and switched to the Depend brand pads after about a week. I used them for 2 to 3 weeks and now use nothing. I am 2 monts out from the surgery. I still wake up 1 or 2 times a night. During the day I don't go as many times as I did before, but when I need to go, I NEED to go.
Posts.Signature: June PSA 7.3 July PSA 7.4 Biopsy mid September, 3 out of 12 cancer. 2 were 30%, 1 was 60%. Gleason 3+4=7 DaVinci Robotic surgery Nov 12th. Nov 20th followup, no cancer outside prostate, cathiter removed.
Posts.Title: Leakage

Posts.Content: I like the idea that with my health insurance, I was able to pick my surgeon and path of treatment. That may not be an option in the next 10 to 15 years. So far out of pocket I have payed around $2500. My hospital said their charge alone was about $3500 to the insurance company. Surgeon was about $4000.

Posts.Title: Why Does It Cost So Much??

Posts.Content: Mamakarne, I am in Loveland, just down the road from you. Sorry for your loss. My father died 9 years ago from pancreatic cancer. he was at the Mayo clinic in Minnesota. My dad or us were never told that he would not live. Looking back, they knew he was going to die when the let me take him back home in South Dakota but never told us that. He lived 6 weeks after being discharged from Mayo, 5 of those weeks in a nursing home after 1 week in the hospital. He was home for 1 day.
